metadata.synopsis: After years of estrangement, Martijn (Hugo Metsers III) decides to visit his lovely sister, Daantje (Kim van Kooten), at her new home in Amsterdam. Recording Daantje's every move with his video camera, Martijn brings up old tensions between the siblings and runs the risk of alienating his sister once again. While Daantje attempts to take refuge from her brother by starting a romance with a local guy, Ramon (Roeland Fernhout), she ultimately must confront Martijn about their troubled past.
